alert.note: Alert for Pike (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 2:56PM EDT until September 08 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Sullivan County in central New York... Northeastern Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 256 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Greeley, or 12 miles northwest of Montague, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello, Lackawaxen, Shohola, Eldred, Oakland, Glen Spey, Greeley, Highland Lake, Millrift, and Hartwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
